title: Problem-Based Computing Project Design for Non-Majors

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Computing education course for social science majors to enhance data analysis and visualization competencies.

learning_goals: Write three or more analysis scripts in Python using real-world social issue data.
Improve algorithms by incorporating peer feedback at least five times using collaboration tools.
Complete two projects applying data structures (lists, dictionaries) and basic sorting algorithms (bubble/quick sort).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
